DOC.brief_summary: This study determine operate room team manage simulated event effectively use critical event checklist . Performance evaluate use score base closely follow protocol critical event management ; 'team ' score score base clinical recovery simulate patient . All team receive debrief session manage 4 scenario . Teams return manage 4 scenarios period 6-9 month . The investigator test hypothesis clinical behavioral team performance improve use Critical Event Checklists . The investigator also expect health professional ( participant ) could attain knowledge relate importance non-technical skill use CECs management critical event .
DOC.brief_title: Simulation Team Training Critical Event Checklist Use Optimizing Management Critical Perioperative Events Ambulatory Surgical Facility
DOC.criteria: Eligibility Criteria Participation : 1 . RN active practice 2 . Anesthesiologist active practice 3 . Surgeon active practice
